price: Aí, então, os crentes foram postos à prova e estremecidos por veemente estremecimento.
arabic: هُنَالِكَ ٱبۡتُلِيَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ وَزُلۡزِلُواْ زِلۡزَالٗا شَدِيدٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: hunālika ub'tuliya al-mu'minūna wazul'zilū zil'zālan shadīdan
